answerBox.snippet: Go to the Apple or Android app. store to download SMARTIFY. Open the app. and hold your phone's camera up to a portrait to “scan” the work of art.
snippetHighlighted: hold your phone's camera up to a portrait to “scan” the work of art

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Can Google identify artwork?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet:
With Google Lens you can identify artworks using your camera, which is great if you're out and about, but you can also choose a screenshot which is what we are doing here. Select the screenshot and search using the image.
Nov 20, 2022
peopleAlsoAsk.title: How to Identify Art Posted Online Using Google Lens - Medium

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How can I identify artwork from a photo?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: There are several apps for both Android and iPhone that allow you to snap a photo of a painting to search through museum catalogues, university databases, and art history texts. This is the easiest way to find a specific painting. The two most popular apps for recognizing artwork are Smartify and Magnus.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: 3 Simple Ways to Identify a Painting - wikiHow

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Is there a Shazam for paintings?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: we've developed ArtVista (ios, android), an app like shazam, but specifically for artworks. you can simply point your camera at any artwork, and ArtVista will tell you what it is. It also answers your questions solely based on the context of the artwork, so you get accurate, no-nonsense responses.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Shazam for Artworks; ArtVista : r/artbusiness - Reddit

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How to use smartify app?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Download the app. Open the app and hold your phone camera up to your chosen artwork. This 'scans' the work and provides extra information as well as background on the artist. Plug in your headphones, listen to the audio tour.
